content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Munich to be quite comfortable and convenient. Let's discuss the rental price to find a fair agreement that suits both of us. How much were you considering to pay per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I'm looking for a place that I can rely on, and I'm willing to pay a fair price for it. I was thinking of a price range that reflects the size and location of the apartment. Would you be willing to start at around 700 Euros per month?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hassan, 700 Euros per month is a reasonable starting point for the size and location of the apartment. However, I'm open to negotiating a price that reflects the value of the property. Would you be willing to pay a bit more to secure this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm also flexible and would like to find a price that we both agree on. How about we start with 750 Euros per month? This would be a good balance for me, considering all the factors.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hassan, your offer of 750 Euros per month is quite close to my expectations. I'm willing to accept this price if you are also agreeable to a one-year lease with a three-month deposit. Does this proposal suit your needs?
name: Heinrich Heine
